name: Simple Weapon Proficiency

sections.body: You make attack rolls with simple weapons without penalty.
sections.name: Benefits

sections.body: When using a weapon with which you are not proficient, you take a –4 penalty on attack rolls.
sections.name: Normal

sections.body: All characters except for druids, monks, and wizards are automatically proficient with all simple weapons. They need not select this feat.
sections.name: Special

description: You are trained in the use of basic weapons.
